title: LB dash does damage before it hits
body: Go ahead and test for yourself, the damage is dealt before she even reaches the destination which is clearly bullshit and unintended.

replies.body:
Ill test now. brb

K, no, its not doing damage before it arrives for me.

Could Be lag, or Mac.

Either your toaster is burnt or it's a bug.

Most likely toaster tho.
